page.title: 09MADAME TUSSAUD'S WOOKEY HOLE
page.content: LADY BANGOR STARTED THE FAIRGROUND COLLECTION BETWEEN 1963 AND 1973. MADAME TUSSAUD'S BROUGHT THE COLLECTION AND FIRST SHOWED IT TO WOOKEY HOLE IN 1974.THE COLECTION IS WOOD CARVED AND PAINTED,THE FAIRGROUND COLLECTION MUST HAVE HAD A LOT OF USE. AND LOOKS VERY BRIGHT AND CHEERFUL, COMING TO LIFE WITH NEW PAINT. THE FAIRGROUND COLLECTION IS VERY OLD, THERE IS AN ORGAN, POLICE LADIES WHOSE ARMS AND LEGS MOVE,AND GAMES MACHINES WHICH USE OLD PENNIES.ANOTHER INTEREST IS A TELEPHONE WHICH TALKS WHEN YOU PUT MONEY IN. THE FAIRGROUND COLLECTION IS VERY POPULAR WITH THE MANY TOURISTS WHO COME TO WOOKEY HOLE.
